1435430.name: Open-World Project
1435430.description:
Join Agent Blooddrop as he is stranded on an Alien planet , where he will learn to survive. He realises then there are people part of his agency captured by a hostile alien group. Will you be able to defeat them? Or will you leave all of your crew mates to die?

SINGLEPLAYER

In Single Player, you will fight to save your teammates stranded on alien planets, There are 4 different planets to explore , and to save your crew mates from different bosses.

MULTIPLAYER CO-OP

In multiplayer co-op, you will play with up to 4 people to speed run the game , and try to see what the best time you can get! You can post screenshots of your times on our official subreddit you get your time published in the game!

MULTIPLAYER VERSUS

In multiplayer versus, you will play with up to 4 people to speed run the game, and try to sabotage your teammates to get the best time! The first one to beat the game wins! Your amount of wins will be tracked, and if you post your screenshots on our subreddit , you can join the total wins leaderboard!
1435430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
